chat_output: According to the Pennsylvania Department of Health Resuscitation 3000A – ALS – Adult protocol, high-flow NC oxygen at 15 LPM using a second oxygen tank can be considered if attempting advanced airway, and a nasal cannula with 15 LPM oxygen can be applied to maintain an appropriate SpO2. For pediatric patients, the same protocol applies, as stated in the Pennsylvania Department of Health Resuscitation 3000P – ALS – Peds protocol.
